title: EUNE serwers are on fire(?)
body:
Hi.
So we all know that RNG fighting vs SKT right now.
I don't have time now, so I want to watch rebroadcast, or just recorded video from that & play now quick co-op for first win.
 Unfortunately I can't play a game:
1) I was in lobby & when game should start there was an information about some error & game didn't started. 
2) I though "Maybe some spaghetti coding again" so I tried to relog
3) After logging i came to huge queue & after 2-3 minutes I logged in
4) When I'm looking for a game everything seems fine https://imgur.com/a/KPAtd
5) But after some time My queue disappears, client is going to main page but I still hear queue's music https://imgur.com/a/EdoZj
6) When I'll try to go to new queue I see this https://imgur.com/a/XPMot

I know, that you want people to watch Worlds, but... Come on!

I just tried to log in now (some time after writing all this stuff) - big queue + the same situation +that red warning abut disabled rankeds  https://imgur.com/a/6h8gW

...{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

replies.body: EU seems to be having issues right now per the [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page.  Once the issue has been resolved, let me know  if these persist.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=5ZmsGfiO,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-10-28T18:00:23.816+0000)
>
> EU seems to be having issues right now per the [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page.  Once the issue has been resolved, let me know  if these persist.

Something like ~6 hours ago, when I came back to home I logged in & tried fast co-op: it worked. Now I launched client & I see only blue indicator about "Shard value changes". So probably everything seems fine
